item.title: All Things Text Manipulation
item.description: sed Multiple Find and Replace instances in a Single Command The sed command is one of the most useful to me in day to day work. It makes text manipulation relatively easy and can be great for lossless large scale manpulations by streaming output to a separate file. I’m working on some copy number data I wanted to strip some leading and trailing arrows from the output of an algorithm I was testing.
